descriptions.description: IDIMT-2022 Digitalization of society, business and management in a pandemic; 30th Interdisciplinary Information Management Talk / Chroust, Gerhard ; Doucek, Petr ; Oškrdal, Václav, page 77-84

It has clearly showed up that pandemic has retarded innovations in some sectors and directions while it boosted innovations in other domains forcing businesses to re-orient their markets and change working habits and technology used. Even within IT and its application domains we see contradictory trends. The keynote will identify current trends and risks associated with (possibly recurring) pandemic crises, increased risks of war having global impacts. It shows recent research outputs documenting the profile of innovation decline generally and in ICT. It summarizes policy recommendation to foster innovation and growth endangered by pandemic.
